description:
Wood Law Firm LLP, in Amarillo, Texas, is dedicated to helping personal injury victims find justice after suffering an injury or loss caused by another party's negligence or wrongdoing. Serving clients across the Texas Panhandle and throughout the western part of the state, our law firm provides aggressive advocacy on behalf of those adversely affected by any of the following:

  • Serious personal injuries
  • Automobile accidents
  • 18-wheeler and commercial truck accidents
  • Defective and dangerous products
  • Medical malpractice
  • Defective medical devices
  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Agricultural-related litigation
  • Workplace injuries

As a Texas native, our founder, Channy F. Wood, cares deeply about the legal issues that affect the citizens of our community. Through our law firm, he works tirelessly to protect the rights and entitlements of hard-working people against large corporations and insurance companies. By using the latest in litigation technology and providing personalized attention to his clients' cases, Mr. Wood is able to deliver effective representation to secure the compensation and benefits his clients need to support themselves and their families. 

If you were injured or lost a loved one due to an accident that was not your fault, Wood Law Firm LLP will help you assert your rights and hold the responsible party accountable. For more information about how we can best assist you in your time of need, you can contact our law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
